mainDescription: Open 24/7 in the heart of the city, the Grosvenor Casino offers an extensive selection of table and electronic games like Blackjack, Poker, Roulette and slot machines to thrill your gaming experience.
secondaryDescription: The two-floor casino not only boasts a vibrant atmosphere and exquisite decor, it also serves a la carte dishes for a great dining experience.

info.address: 142 West Marketgait, Dundee DD1 1NJ Scotland, United Kingdom.

facilities.title: Food & Drink
content: Dine at the Grosvenor’s stylish restaurant and enjoy a drink at the bar.

facilities.title: Rooftop
content: No rooftop area, but the casino’s fine interiors and exhilarating vibe make it an excellent leisure choice.

facilities.title: Live Shows
content: Although it may host occasional themed nights, it does not provide live shows.

facilities.title: Business Meetings
content: Available service hire for private parties and special occasions with personalized services.

facilities.title: Grosvenor Casinos Membership
content: The Grosvenors membership programme enables special offers and exclusive benefits.

info.dressCode: Smart casual and relaxed is encouraged, but formal attire is always welcome.
info.ageRestrictions: Guests must be 18 or older to enter, in line with UK regulations.
